name: Limerick City and County Council
goal: Limerick City and County Council (Comhairle Cathrach agus Contae Luimnigh) is the authority responsible for local government in the City of Limerick and County Limerick in Ireland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Regional Development
Agriculture and Rural Development
Transport and Tourism
Environment, Public Health and Food Safety
Industry, Research and Energy
Culture and Education
